Text: The CtrlHD release of Game of Thrones are the best quality available. Thank you so much for sharing them!
Thanks, gotta love the quality! Any chance somebody knows what subtitles out there syncs with the 1080i GoT releases so far? And where to get them?

The english subtitles that work with all six of these CtrlHD releases can be found here -
http://subscene.com/Game-Of-Thrones-First-Season/subtitles-85805.aspx

For example -

CTU -"Game.Of.Thrones.S01E01.Winter.Is.Coming.720p.HDTV.x264-CTU" worked perfectly for the first three episodes -
http://subscene.com/english/Game-Of-Thrones-First-Season/subtitle-430050.aspx

MrMoody- "Game.of.Thrones.S01E04.Cripples.Bastards.and.Broken.Things.720P.HDTV.DD5.1.x264-MrMoody" worked perfectly for episodes 4 and 5 (I can't find episode 6)
http://subscene.com/english/Game-Of-Thrones-First-Season/subtitle-436134.aspx

EbP - "Game of Thrones S01E06 720p HDTV DD5.1 x264-EbP.eng" worked perfectly for episode 6
http://subscene.com/english/Game-Of-Thrones-First-Season/subtitle-440941.aspx

I'm also using the latest version of Media Player Classic-Home Cinema (http://mpc-hc.sourceforge.net/) with K-Lite Codec Mega Pack (http://www.filehippo.com/download_klite_mega_codec/) with the 7.1.8 update (http://www.softpedia.com/get/Multimedia/Video/Codec-Packs-Video-Codecs/KLite-Mega-Codec-Pack.shtml).
Friend. Any plans to upload episode seven?

@Exaulted

Thanks a lot dude. Was trying to find subs that worked for these releases, but had a hart time for episode 4-6. You just made my day.

I'm seeding this torrent with english subtitles for all 10 of the 1080i episodes of Game of Thrones

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6483898/Game_of_Thrones_-_S01_-_ENGLISH_SUBTITLES_-_1080i.HDTV.DD5.1.MPE
